nodes.text: The Hismaul system was a star system located in the Karthakk sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Trailing Sectors. It was home to a creature known as the Hismauli hawk-snake.
The Hismaul system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square Q-16.
